description: Try our easy to follow Beef & Bean Pasta Bake recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Beef & Bean Pasta Bake Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 420 g Whitlock & Sons Killer Beans in Fred's Ballistic Tomato & Basil Sauce

recipeInstructions.text: Bake for 1520 minutes until beans are hot and cheese has melted. Garnish with freshly chopped parsley. Serve with a fresh green salad on the side
